public int calculateAgeWithJava7(
  Date birthDate, 
  Date currentDate) {            
    // validate inputs ...                                                                               
    DateFormat formatter = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd");                           
    int d1 = Integer.parseInt(formatter.format(birthDate));                            
    int d2 = Integer.parseInt(formatter.format(currentDate));                          
    int age = (d2 - d1) / 10000;                                                       
    return age;                                                                        
}
